body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling NoteWorthy, the premier music school. My name is Andrew Washington. How may I assist you today?

Hi Andrew, I'm Cynthia Cook. I just noticed my bill for this month, and it looks higher than I expected.

I'm sorry to hear that, Cynthia. Let's take a closer look at your account. Could you please confirm your account number for me? It's usually a combination of six digits.

Sure, the account number is zero one two three four five.

Great, thank you. Let me pull up your account details. Could you also provide me with your email address to verify your identity?

My email is cynthia.cook@email.com.

Thank you, Cynthia. I see here that there are additional charges for the new advanced piano classes you enrolled in. They seem to have been added this month.

I didn't realize they would increase my bill by so much! How much more do those classes cost?

The advanced classes have a monthly fee of two zero zero dollars added to your standard tuition, which is why you see the increased amount.

I understand now. I wasn't informed about that when I enrolled.

I apologize for any inconvenience, Cynthia. I'll make sure to pass on your feedback to the administrative team. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

No, that's all. Thank you for the explanation, Andrew.

You're welcome, Cynthia. Thank you for being a valued member of NoteWorthy. Have a great day!

You're welcome, Cynthia. Thank you for being a valued member of NoteWorthy. Have a great day!
